bugs.title: jenkins-credentials-plugin: stored credentials are not visible in UI

bugzilla.short_desc: jenkins-credentials-plugin: stored credentials are not visible in UI

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:

I noticed that when I am trying to create new slave machine via 
<master>/computer/createItem, I can provide new credentials which Jenkins can later use to connect to the new slave machine. Clicking on "Add" button adds these credentials into Jenkins configuration file, but web UI doesn't show anything and I am thus not able to pick them from drop-down menu.

Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
jenkins-credentials-plugin-1.10-5.fc21.noarch

How reproducible:
100%

jenkins-mailer-plugin-1.12-1.fc21,jenkins-javadoc-plugin-1.3-1.fc21,jenkins-external-monitor-job-plugin-1.4-1.fc21,jenkins-junit-plugin-1.2-1.fc21,jenkins-matrix-project-plugin-1.4-1.fc21,jenkins-icon-shim-1.0.4-1.fc21,jenkins-credentials-plugin-1.18-2.fc21,jenkins-ssh-credentials-plugin-1.10-3.fc21,jenkins-ssh-slaves-plugin-1.9-2.fc21,jenkins-winstone-2.8-1.fc21,stapler-1.233-1.fc21,jenkins-remoting-2.48-1.fc21,jenkins-ant-plugin-1.2-3.fc21,jenkins-1.590-1.fc21 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 21.

jenkins-mailer-plugin-1.12-1.fc21, jenkins-javadoc-plugin-1.3-1.fc21, jenkins-external-monitor-job-plugin-1.4-1.fc21, jenkins-junit-plugin-1.2-1.fc21, jenkins-matrix-project-plugin-1.4-1.fc21, jenkins-icon-shim-1.0.4-1.fc21, jenkins-credentials-plugin-1.18-2.fc21, jenkins-ssh-credentials-plugin-1.10-3.fc21, jenkins-ssh-slaves-plugin-1.9-2.fc21, jenkins-winstone-2.8-1.fc21, stapler-1.233-1.fc21, jenkins-remoting-2.48-1.fc21, jenkins-ant-plugin-1.2-3.fc21, jenkins-1.590-1.fc21 has been pushed to the Fedora 21 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

Description of problem:

jenkins-icon-shim resides in /usr/share/jenkins/plugins/jenkins-icon-shim and Jenkins creates symlink "jenkins-icon-shim.jpi" in its plugin directory. The problem is that the real name of the plugin is just "icon-shim" (without jenkins- prefix). Everything works fine until user decides to update the plugin via update center. Newer version will not override older RPM version because the names are different.

Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
jenkins-icon-shim-1.0.3-3.fc21.noarch

How reproducible:
100%
